# Polar / Verso

[Polar / Verso](https://github.com/GermanoGallicchio/Polar): 

A new software with traditional and novel indices for the analysis of oscillatory coupling.

Combining:

- circular statistics
- unbiased estimators
- harmonic analysis
- linear algebra
- resampling statistics

In progress/upcoming:

- Algorithm development
- Application to physiological data
